channel.title: Shops
channel.description: I am using a trisidiaX v3 source on my computer with a rspscoding client online. im trying to add a shop and i already made my shop on shops in source, and put the spawn-config to where i want it. is there a step im missing?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Are you having issues opening the shop? And these are the steps:

Make a shop in shops.cfg

Go to the java file where the npc interactions are located

There should be an entire section in that dedicated to shops (is a switch statement and has the case being the npc id and the return value the shop id)

once youâ€™ve done that, compile and it should work A ok

Read full topic
